data.name: Midnight GroupMe
data.description: A dark theme for GroupMe. This is designed to be a very simple and straightforward reskin with very few creative liberties taken -- I wanted it to look like an official dark mode might look. I've gone through just about every feature I know of in GroupMe and made sure this theme looks right. There's still a few minor issues with consistency and probably a few functions that I missed, but you probably won't notice any issues unless you're really hunting for them. If you find an issue, feel free to leave a comment, tweet me (@oxguy3), or email me (haydenschiff@gmail.com). This theme is partially based on Darkly, a free theme for Bootstrap. I used Darkly to override the basic Bootstrap theme rules (as GroupMe also uses Bootstrap), and then I manually adapted all of GroupMe's custom CSS to match the dark style.

data.description: While video is playing the page will turn dark automatically, giving focus to the video.

data.name: Youtube Custom Accent Color
data.description: A CSS style to make the Youtube page more personal with a custom accent color (can be modified at line 8, labed as --color). Works best with dark theme enabled.

data.name: RPS in Pieces (new: dark mode!)
data.description: Improves Rockpapershotgun's new theme. Hides ads (without blocking, use in conjunction with an adblocker if you want), removes several areas of whitespace and unnecessary text. Reduces screen real estate taken up by the header and featured articles. Hides the "tips" etc. article suggestions. Adds backgrounds to RPS team member comments, so we can easily make them out again. Fixes a bug with RPS comment button styling. Makes RPS read like the old, in a new theme. Customisable options: Minimal site header Minimal spotlight 'featured articles' Dark mode! Darken images (default no) - slightly darkens pictures so as to not blind those of us on the dark theme when an exceptionally bright image is embedded. Image will show normally on mouse over. Logo choices! Centered comments Line height (spacing) Justified hyphenation Show/hide ads TO DO: add higher density content options
